column2: §Y[GetMainOldGodName]§! has granted me §G[local_received_offmap_old_gods_currency_insanity_from_sacrifices_total_variable.GetValue]§! §YInsanity§! for sacrificing the population of §Y[target_sacrifice_location.GetName]§!!
column4: §Y[GetMainOldGodName]§! hat mir §G[local_received_offmap_old_gods_currency_insanity_from_sacrifices_total_variable.GetValue]§! §YWahnsinn§! dafür gewährt, dass ich die Bevölkerung von §Y[target_sacrifice_location.GetName]§! geopfert habe!

column2: After the siege of §Y[target_sacrifice_location.GetName]§!, your troops sacrificed its population to §Y[target_sacrificer_unit_owner.Religion.GetHighGodName]§!!
column4: Nach der Belagerung von §Y[target_sacrifice_location.GetName]§! haben Eure Truppen die dortige Bevölkerung §Y[target_sacrificer_unit_owner.Religion.GetHighGodName]§! geopfert!

column2: After the siege of §Y[target_sacrifice_location.GetName]§!, §Y[target_sacrificer_unit_owner.GetFirstName]§! sacrificed its population to §Y[target_sacrificer_unit_owner.Religion.GetHighGodName]§!!
column4: Nach der Belagerung von §Y[target_sacrifice_location.GetName]§! opferte §Y[target_sacrificer_unit_owner.GetFirstName]§! die dortige Bevölkerung §Y[target_sacrificer_unit_owner.Religion.GetHighGodName]§!!
